name: @example-app/plant-store
description: Plant store example built with the Ficus App Shell

scripts.build:assets: ncp public/assets build/assets/ && pmj public/app.webmanifest -o build/app.webmanifest && ncp public/sw.js build/sw.js && pmj public/app-config.json -o build/app-config.json
scripts.html:index:app:main: rollup -i src/main.js -o tmp/main.js -f es -m -p "terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}" -p "filesize={}" -p "minify-html-literals={}" -p "node-resolve={}"
scripts.html:index:app:desktop: rollup -i src/app-ui-desktop/main.js -o build/app-ui-desktop/main.js -f es -m -p "terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}" -p "filesize={}" -p "minify-html-literals={}" -p "node-resolve={}"
scripts.html:index:app:mobile: rollup -i src/app-ui-mobile/main.js -o build/app-ui-mobile/main.js -f es -m -p "terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}" -p "filesize={}" -p "minify-html-literals={}" -p "node-resolve={}"
scripts.html:index:app:sw: rollup -i src/service-worker/main.js -o tmp/service-worker/main.js -f es -m -p "terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}" -p "filesize={}" -p "minify-html-literals={}" -p "node-resolve={}"
scripts.prebuild: rimraf build tmp && mkdirp build tmp/styles

author: Matt Levy
